alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie; Seminole (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 05 at 2:11PM CDT until May 06 at 7:12AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Oklahoma... Little River near Tecumseh affecting Seminole and Pottawatomie Counties.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. OKC125-133-060715- /O.EXT.KOUN.FL.W.0003.000000T0000Z-220506T1212Z/ /TCMO2.1.ER.220505T0305Z.220505T0530Z.220506T0612Z.NO/ 211 PM CDT Thu May 5 2022 ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River near Tecumseh. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Flooding to depths of 3 feet occurs over croplands... pastures... and rural roads along the river. The area affected is entirely rural... and downstream of Lake Thunderbird... from near Macomb in Pottawatomie County to near Bowlegs in western Seminole County. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:30 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 13.7 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 1:30 PM CDT Thursday was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise to a crest of 14.0 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
